value:
I've got this costume, pumpkins line
every street, and there's candy as far
as the eye can see...$k$pI think this festival will be fun.

I lived with my father in Darkling
Woods for a very long time, so I've
never seen such a lively festival.

I hear you're supposed to play a trick
on someone if they don't give you
treats, but...$k$pOh, I could never do anything so
mean to someone. I guess it's OK if I
don't get any treats...

There's no candy where I lived in
Darkling Woods... And now I've
definitely eaten too much.

I dreamt a pumpkin monster was
chasing me! It was so scary...and
now I can't get back to sleep.

Trick or treat! Hehe. I brought you a
big harvest-festival greeting from
$Nf!
So much candy... I'm so happy!

I bet I could do a good job at scaring
people...if I became a dragon!
Sorry... Guess I didn't do it right.

Om nom nom! Thish candy ish
deelishush!

Trick or treat! I'm Myrrh! Are you
going to the harvest festival too?

I've been alive for so long...but this
is the first time I've experienced such
a fun festival.$k$pEveryone's laughing and dancing.
They're all handing out candy...$k$pAnd, well, there are some scary
monsters wandering around, but
still, I'm having so much fun!$k$pEven though I think all the people
I've met here will be gone in a
thousand years...$k$pI won't forget any of them. Even after
a thousand years...and then another
thousand!$k$pI'll remember this festival and the
time I spent with everyone.$k$pTrick or treat! I'd never even heard
this phrase before coming here, but
it'll remind me of all the fun I had.
えい
いたずら…
きゃああっ！
大変です…
I've got a trick for you!
Trick or treat!
Boo!
Candy Grudge!
Are ghosts...sad?
Ummm
I'm...twelve-hundred years old. Roughly.
Are you trying to play a trick on me? Because I'd prefer a treat.
I wonder what would happen to this outfit if I changed into a dragon...
I may not technically be a child... But I still like candy!
Ohh, I just want some candy... Oh, but, if I can't have any, that's OK. Just...don't pay me any mind...
I don't like ghosts. And now that I'm thinking about them, I won't be able to fall asleep tonight.
If I have a scary dream tonight, will you come sit with me and make sure I'm safe?
Understood.
Time for tricks?
Have some treats!
